content.rendered:
torqit Power Module

The Torqit Power Module performance chip uses less fuel, yet creates more power by maximising the energy output from each drop of fuel.

The Power Module is a 4WD performance chip that safely unleashes power, torque and fuel efficiency lost through factory programming in your vehicle’s on-board computer.

Your vehicle will be under considerable stress when towing heavy loads, and this stress can impact the life of your vehicle. A Power Module reduces that stress, increasing all round power and torque.

Perfect for anyone towing a caravan, boat or trailer, a Power Module allows your vehicle to perform to its maximum ability. You’ll notice the pulling power immediately, enjoying a much smoother driving experience.

Plug & play Installation

Every Torqit Power Module is specifically programmed for vehicle make, model and engine type.

It sits between two existing plugs in the vehicle’s fuel operating system. As this is located in different areas depending on the vehicle, ensure you review vehicle specific fitting instructions. Installation is quick and easy, taking just 15 minutes.

This unit can be used as a hardwired or Bluetooth-controlled module. The best part is that you do not have to choose – once the Power Module is installed on a vehicle, it is automatically set to the highest performance mode. The Bluetooth mode has three optimum settings to choose from, Economy, Cruise and Sport, each increasing with power and torque. To alter the tune, download Torqit’s Connect app and follow the instructions.

Advantages of a Power Module

From protective safety parameters to convenient app control, discover the many benefits of a Torqit Power Module.

  • 1  Increased performance: You will be able to feel the increase in power, as the module alters your air to fuel ratio to a more optimum mixture.
  • 2  Vehicle-specific software: Enjoy peace of mind that the Power Module cannot negatively affect your vehicle’s performance. The software within the Power Module chip has been specifically designed within the safety parameters of the vehicle.
  • 3  3 settings for all driving applications: The vehicle can be tuned to your driving style, allowing you to control how much power you give it.
  • 4  Wireless app control: The unit is controlled via the Torqit Connect App, so you will have access to the latest technology with every update.
  • 5  Product casing: Each unit has heavy duty vibration and water resistant ABS plastic molded housing.
  • 6  Simple installation: Installation is simple and can be completed in approximately 15 minutes for most vehicles.
  • 7  5 year product warranty: The unit automatically comes with a warranty which offers you peace of mind. It also does not void vehicle/factory warranty.
  • 8  Vehicle suitability: The unit can be fitted to most turbo petrol and turbo diesel vehicles.
  • 9  30 day money back guarantee: We are so confident that you will love this unit, we offer a 30 day money back guarantee.
